overview: MeanBitch Productions presents the third installment of a series that makes the female-supremacy fantasies of male viewers into brutal, erotic reality! The vignettes of “FaceSitting Tales #3” portray stark sexual and psychological abuse. Fans of female ass smothering and foot worship submit their cruelest scenarios, and the vicious MeanBitch bitches execute these harsh punishments with evil glee.
title: Facesitting Tales 3
